mapper.select: select mch_img from machines where mch_num=#{mch_num}
mapper.insert: insert into machines (mch_num, mch_name, mch_img, mch_serial, mch_date, mch_info, mch_detail) values (#{mch_num}, #{mch_name}, #{mch_img}, #{mch_serial}, #{mch_date}, #{mch_info}, #{mch_detail})
mapper.update: update machines set mch_name=#{mch_name}, mch_img =#{mch_img} ,mch_serial=#{mch_serial},mch_info=#{mch_info},mch_detail=#{mch_detail},mch_date=#{mch_date} where mch_num=#{mch_num}
mapper.select: where true order by mch_num desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
